attributes.action: take Britain out of front line fighting against 'Terrorism' and play the peacekeeper.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 12th January 2007 Tony Blair defended his military actions and insists that Britain 'must continue to fight wars'.  The undersigned belive that this is not the right approach for this country and does not protect or make Britain any safer from the threat of terrorism.
